fr.An account validation email was just sen: Un email vient de vous être envoyé
fr.If you haven't received the validation e: Si vous n'avez pas reçu cet email, vérifiez s'il n'est pas dans votre dossier "indésirables"
fr.The validation email is sent from the ad: Cet email est envoyé depuis l'adresse info@zenyway.com
fr.To finalize the creation of your account: Pour finaliser la création de votre compte, vous devez cliquer sur le lien fourni dans cet email

en.An account validation email was just sen: An account validation email was just sent to you
en.If you haven't received the validation e: If you haven't received the validation email, please check your spam folder
en.The validation email is sent from the ad: The validation email is sent from the address info@zenyway.com
en.To finalize the creation of your account: To finalize the creation of your account, please follow the link in that email
